documentation.text:
@notice allows creator of a sale to foricibly end a sale
@param saleId id of the sale*
@notice fetches all tokenIds listed for sale*
@notice fetches all of the active nft license sales on the platform*

params.nftContract: nft contract for minting license nft
params.price: of the item in the sale
params.rbp: royalty basis points, percentage of royalty to be collected by license creator

params.amount: the amount of nfts to be put up for sale
params.nftContract: nft contract address of the license nft
params.tokenId: the tokenId of the Saas License nft

participate(uint256,uint256).details: erc20 transfer needs to be pre-approved

params.licenseId: id of the license to sell

fetchActiveSales().notice: fetches all of the active nft license sales on the platform*

fetchListedLicenses().notice: fetches all tokenIds listed for sale*

forceCloseSale(uint256).notice: allows creator of a sale to foricibly end a sale

listLicense(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: gives the heirloom operator permission to sell an token amount on behalf of the user

participate(uint256,uint256).notice: allows a user to participate in a license sale

purchaseLicense(uint256,uint256).notice: transfers license item to send on tokenTransfer
